import React from 'react' import { Card,CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,photo, city,price,featured,avgRating, reviews}=tour return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}({reviews.length})
{title}
${price } /per person/
) } export default TourCard
